DOC.brief_summary: To assess safety efficacy itraconazole versus placebo prevention histoplasmosis HIV-infected patient CD4 count < 150 cells/mm3 reside histoplasmosis endemic . To assess safety efficacy itraconazole prevent debilitate fungal infection , cryptococcosis , aspergillosis , recalcitrant oropharyngeal vaginal candidiasis , recurrent esophageal candidiasis .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Itraconazole Prevention Histoplasmosis , Fungal Infection , HIV-Infected Patients
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Patients must : HIV infection . Residence area endemic H. capsulatum . Absolute CD4 count < 150 cells/mm3 . No current past active histoplasmosis . No active fungal infection . Life expectancy least 1 year . Exclusion Criteria Coexisting Condition : Patients follow symptoms condition exclude : Lifethreatening infection malignancy cutaneous Kaposi 's sarcoma . Inability take oral medication . Concurrent Medication : Excluded : Systemicallyactive antifungal . Investigational drug ( expanded access drug acceptable ) . Rifampin . Rifabutin . Terfenadine . Astemizole . Phenobarbital . Phenytoin . Carbamazepine . H2 blocker . Omeprazole . Continual antacid . Patients follow prior condition exclude : History intolerance imidazole azole compound . Prior Medication : Excluded within 1 month prior study entry : Investigational drug ( expanded access drug acceptable ) . Excluded within 15 day prior study entry : Rifampin . Rifabutin . Terfenadine . Astemizole . Phenobarbital . Phenytoin . Carbamazepine .
